info.title: OData Service for namespace ODataDemo
info.description:
This OData service is located at [http://services.odata.org/V3/(S(1urrjxgkuh4r30yqim0hqrtj))/OData/OData.svc/](http://services.odata.org/V3/%28S%281urrjxgkuh4r30yqim0hqrtj%29%29/OData/OData.svc/)

## Entity Data Model
![ER Diagram](http://yuml.me/diagram/class/[Product{bg:orange}],[Product]-*>[Category],[Product]-0..1>[Supplier],[Product]-0..1>[ProductDetail],[Product]^[FeaturedProduct{bg:orange}],[FeaturedProduct]-0..1>[Advertisement],[ProductDetail{bg:orange}],[ProductDetail]-0..1>[Product],[Category{bg:orange}],[Category]-*>[Product],[Supplier{bg:orange}],[Supplier]-0..1>[Address],[Supplier]-*>[Product],[Address],[Person{bg:orange}],[Person]-0..1>[PersonDetail],[Person]^[Customer{bg:orange}],[Person]^[Employee{bg:orange}],[PersonDetail{bg:orange}],[PersonDetail]-0..1>[Address],[PersonDetail]-0..1>[Person],[Advertisement{bg:orange}],[Advertisement]-0..1>[FeaturedProduct])

## References
- [Org.OData.Capabilities.V1](https://github.com/oasis-tcs/odata-vocabularies/blob/master/vocabularies/Org.OData.Capabilities.V1.md)
